title: A baker's dozen of S74s for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: A baker's dozen of S74s for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed Hans
1) Bescher blue-poor-$25.00
2) Mordecai Brown-ivory-(HOF)-ex/mint-$350.00
3) Camnitz pink-superb ex/mint with a terrific image-$125.00
4) Carrigan pink-minor soiling-ex-$SOLD
5) Doyle orange-near mint-slightly off center-$SOLD
6) Lobert deep red-has a few folds which could be ironed out if desired-tough color-ex-$175.00
7) Rube Marquard gold (HOF)-gorgeous near mint-$350.00 
8) Needham gold-ex-$125.00
9) Overall light green-ex terrific image-$SOLD
10) Shean orange-superb near mint, strong image, slightly off center-$150.00
11) Sheckard pink-a couple folds and slight soiling-vg/ex-$90.00
12) Stone ivory-light fold-ex-$SOLD
13) Willett deep red ex/mint-$200.00

All prices delivered. Please note that the lines present on some of the silks are from the plastics that I left them in when I scanned them.

First come, first served. Please email or call to confirm. Check or money order only. Please send to Ed Hans P.O. Box 307 Buffalo, N.Y. 14207. (716) 876-6359-Evenings and weekends are best, but call anytime and leave a message. Or email at edhans@monkberry.com. Thanks for looking.
